document_data.mainbody:
arrom Ithal II was the first crown prince of the kingdom of Tethyr.
Darrom was the son of King Darrom Ithal and Queen Saraala. He was the older brother of Silvam Ithal and had a younger sister as well.
Prince Darrom was born shortly after the marriage of his parents in . Sadly, the kingdoms first prince and heir to the throne of the Ithal Dynasty died of a fever in , while not even six years old.
